text: Then some of the leaders of the Ephraimites 28:12 That is, the leaders of the northern kingdom of Israel—Azariah son of Jehohanan, Berechiah son of Meshillemoth,28:12 Meshillemoth is a variant of Meshillemith; see 1 Chronicles 9:12. Jehizkiah son of Shallum, and Amasa son of Hadlai—stood in opposition to those arriving from the war.
